selected-country.title: Belgium - A Jewel of Western Europe
selected-country.subtitle: From the medieval towns of Bruges to the vibrant city of Brussels, Belgium offers a unique blend of history, culture, and cuisine.

selected-country.title: Travel And Explore Belgium - Discover the Heart of Western Europe
selected-country.subtitle: Belgium is renowned for its rich history, stunning architecture, and delicious cuisine, including waffles and chocolate.
selected-country.text: Belgium is a country filled with charm and culture. Explore the grand architecture of Brussels, the canals of Bruges, or the historic sites in Antwerp. Belgium's diverse landscape, from lush forests to vibrant cities, offers something for every type of traveler. Don't miss the opportunity to sample Belgium's famous beer and indulge in world-class chocolates while experiencing the beauty and culture of this fascinating country.
selected-country.text-2: Belgium’s cities like Ghent and Bruges transport you back in time with their medieval charm, while Brussels is home to modern marvels and political hubs. The Belgian coast offers picturesque seaside views, and the Ardennes region is perfect for nature lovers. Whether you're exploring the lively city life or relaxing in tranquil countryside, Belgium is sure to captivate you.

selected-country.title: Explore Belgium's Natural Wonders
selected-country.subtitle: From the rolling hills of the Ardennes to the stunning Belgian coastline, Belgium is home to diverse natural landscapes.

selected-country.title: Brussels
selected-country.subtitle: The Heart of Europe
selected-country.text: Brussels, the capital of Belgium and the de facto capital of the European Union, is a city that seamlessly blends modernity with history. At its heart lies the Grand Place, a UNESCO World Heritage site surrounded by ornate guildhalls and the stunning Town Hall. The Atomium, a symbol of the city, offers panoramic views and fascinating exhibitions. Art lovers will find solace in the Royal Museums of Fine Arts, showcasing masterpieces from Magritte to Bruegel. Brussels is also famous for its culinary scene, with its iconic waffles, fries, and an extensive array of Belgian beers. The city’s multicultural vibe is reflected in its diverse neighborhoods, each with its own character. From historic architecture to vibrant street art, Brussels captivates visitors with its dynamic energy.

selected-country.title: Flanders
selected-country.subtitle: The Artistic Heartland
selected-country.text: Flanders, the northern region of Belgium, is renowned for its artistic heritage, picturesque towns, and vibrant cities. Antwerp, the Diamond Capital, is also home to stunning architecture and the masterpieces of Rubens. Ghent blends medieval charm with a modern flair, while Bruges enchants visitors with its canals and cobblestone streets. Leuven, a university town, adds a lively atmosphere, with its ornate Town Hall and brewing tradition. Flanders is a region that captures the essence of Belgium.

selected-country.title: Wallonia
selected-country.subtitle: The Cultural Soul of Belgium
selected-country.text: Wallonia, the French-speaking southern region, is rich in heritage, natural beauty, and vibrant traditions. The city of Namur, with its citadel, serves as the region's cultural hub. Liège, known for its industrial past, now boasts modern museums and lively squares. The medieval villages, like Durbuy, transport visitors to a bygone era. Wallonia reveals a deep connection to Belgium's roots.

selected-country.title: Ardennes
selected-country.subtitle: Nature's Playground
selected-country.text: The Ardennes is a paradise for nature enthusiasts. Known for dense forests and rolling hills, it’s perfect for hiking, cycling, and kayaking. In winter, the region transforms into a snowy wonderland. The town of Dinant and the caves of Han-sur-Lesse are must-visits. The Ardennes offers a refreshing escape into nature.

selected-country.title: Belgian Coast
selected-country.subtitle: Where the Sea Meets Serenity
selected-country.text: Stretching along the North Sea, the Belgian Coast is a blend of sandy beaches and charming resorts. Ostend, De Haan, and Knokke-Heist offer diverse experiences, from maritime vibes to Belle Époque charm. Whether sunbathing or strolling along the dunes, the coast offers relaxation and maritime charm.
